hero.name: hasha dar
hero.title: I am an AI & Data Consultant

about.heading: about
about.content: I'm a Consulting Senior Analyst at Deloitte working in the AI & Data department. My work involves helping our clients implement AI solutions and manage their data effectively. I hold a mechanical engineering degree from UCL, graduating in 2023. In my free time, I develop apps and do photography. I primarily shoot portraiture and a bit of travel! I also enjoy theatre, where I worked as a production manager and contributed to sound and lighting design.

roles.description: Technology and Transformation | AI and Data.
